item.title: Save $30 On Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Edition With This Black Friday Discount
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/save-30-on-alan-wake-2-deluxe-edition-with-this-black-friday-discount/1100-6527939/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

More than a decade after the original's release, Alan Wake 2 finally arrived in 2023--and it didn’t disappoint. Our Alan Wake 2 review gave it a stellar 10/10, thanks to a memorable campaign, unique survival-horror mechanics, and somehow living up to the 13 years of hype. Anyone who missed out on the instant classic will now find Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Edition for $50 (was $80) during Black Friday, the lowest price we’ve ever seen.

Both the PS5 and Xbox Series X versions are eligible for the savings, making this the ideal time to finally cross Alan Wake 2 off your wishlist. The deluxe edition is a particularly great entry point for newcomers, as it also includes Alan Wake Remastered, giving you a chance to play through the original story before diving into the sequel. Both titles received positive reviews, and if you’re a fan of supernatural thrillers, you’ll find much to love about the two games.

Here's a look at everything included in Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Edition.

Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Edition Contents

  • Alan Wake 2 physical game
  • The Night Springs and Lake House expansions
  • Various in-game cosmetics
  • Alan Wake Remastered digital voucher

That’s an impressive lineup of content, and for just $50, it’s an easy recommendation. We haven’t seen many price cuts for Alan Wake 2: Deluxe Edition, making this a Black Friday sale worth checking out.

Alan Wake 2 follows both its namesake character and FBI agent Saga Anderson as it weaves two unique storylines. Alan is attempting to escape the Dark Place--a supernatural location with unknown origins--while Saga Anderson is investigating a murder. Things eventually spiral out of control, and its conclusion will stick with you long after you put down the controller. It’s a thrilling tale, and one that should please longtime fans of the franchise.

Looking for more deals? Head over to our Black Friday Hub for roundups on all the best price cuts on laptops, collectibles, Lego sets, video games, and more.
